Sentencas: A new method for fabrication of metal-cermet anodes in solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) has been developed.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Highly porous, yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) films were prepared using a mixture of zircon fibers (YSZp, Si-stabilized, and <0.3% Si) and normal YSZ powders (YSZd).
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The films remained highly porous following calcination up to 1550 degrees C, after which either Cu or Ni could be incorporated by impregnation with the nitrate salts.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For Cu cermets, the performance increased with metal loading to at least 40% Cu.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C using H-2 as the fuel and a 230 mu m, YSZ electrolyte, the current-voltage (I-V) curves for either a Cu- or Ni-cermet anode formed using this new method were found to be identical to the I-V curve for a Ni cermet formed using traditional methods.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy showed that the anode films remained porous even with addition of Cu, so that additional modification was possible.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Tests of this concept through the addition of ceria by impregnation with the Ce(NO3)(3) led to an additional increase in the cell performance.
Titulo: A novel method for preparing anode cermets for solid oxide fuel cells
